data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulations 30 And 33 Of SEBI LODR Regulations, 2015 - Audited Financial Results For Year Ended On 31St March, 2023
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held to-day have approved and taken on record financial results, both on stand alone and consolidated basis, for quarter/year ended on 31st March, 2023 audited by the Company''s Statutory Auditors, M/s S R Batliboi & Co. LLP and reviewed by Company''s Audit Committee in their meeting also held earlier today.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Disclosure Under Regulations 30 And 33 Of SEBI LODR Regulations, 2015 - Audited Financial Results For Year Ended On 31St March, 2023 And Recommendation For Final Dividend
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held to-day have approved and taken on
record financial results, both on stand alone and consolidated basis, for quarter/year ended on 31st
March, 2023 audited by the Company''s Statutory Auditors, M/s S R Batliboi & Co. LLP and
reviewed by Company''s Audit Committee in their meeting also held earlier today.

In the aforesaid meeting following Company''s Policy on Dividend Distribution, the Board also
resolved to recommend payment of Final Dividend of 70 % (Rs 7 per Equity Share of Rs IO each
face value) for FY 2022-23, subject to necessary approvals/permissions including shareholders of
the Company at their ensuing Annual General Meeting.

The Board Meeting commenced at 12.20 Hours and concluded at 14.50 Hours.

However in the file upload section of said Corporate Announcement, disclosure letter with correct path of the Earnings Call recording was given. Hence, it is requested that path given in body of said Corporate announcement be read as  http://www.ifglref.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/IFGL_Q3FY23_Earnings_Call_Audio.mp3, as also mentioned in the disclosure letter attached therewith, instead of http://www.ifglref.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/earnings-call-transcript-17-August-2022.mp3

data.news_body: In accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (LODR), Text of the following along with copy each of Report dated 28th May, 2022 thereon of Statutory Auditors, without any modified opinion, are submitted herewith for your perusal, necessary action and record- Audited stand alone and consolidated financial results (CFS) and Extract of CFS for quarter/year ended on 31st March, 2022

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Disclosure Under Regulations 30 And 33 Of SEBI LODR Regulations, 2015 - Audited Financial Results For Year Ended On 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
In accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (LODR), Text of the following along with copy each of Report dated 28th May, 2022 thereon of Statutory Auditors, without any modified opinion, are submitted herewith for your perusal, necessary action and record.
Audited stand alone and consolidated financial results (CFS) and extract of CFS for quarter/year ended on 31st March, 2022.In the aforesaid meeting following Company's Policy on Dividend Distribution, the Board also resolved to recommend payment of Final Dividend of 70 % (Rs 7 per Equity Share of Rs 10 each face value) for FY 2021-22, subject to necessary approvals/permissions including shareholders of the Company at their ensuing Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results For Three/Nine  Months Ended On 31St December,  2021
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held to-day have approved and taken on record unaudited financial results, both on stand alone and consolidated basis, for three/nine months ended on 31st Dec, 2021. Said unaudited financial results have also been subjected to 'Limited Review' by the Company's Statutory Auditors, M/s S R Batliboi & Co. LLP.
In accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 (LODR), following along with copy each of Report dated 12th Feb, 2022 of said Statutory Auditors are enclosed herewith for your perusal, necessary action and record.
a) Unaudited stand alone financial results for three/nine months ended on 31st Dec, 2021.
b) Unaudited consolidated financial results for three/nine months ended on 31st Dec, 2021.
c) Extract of Unaudited consolidated financial results for three/nine months ended on 31st Dec, 2021 being published in newspapers following Regulation 47(1)(b) of LODR

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulations 30 And 33 Of SEBI LODR Regulations, 2015 - Audited Consolidated Financial Results For Quarter And Year Ended On 31St March, 2021
data.news_body:
In supersession to our earlier letter of to-day 5th June, 2021, we submit herewith Text of audited consolidated financial results for quarter/year ended on 31st March, 2021 along with Report of Statutory Auditor thereon, received from Statutory Auditors, M/s SR Batliboi & Co LLP, Chartered Accountants,after correcting typographical error in UDIN mentioned in their Report. We, thus request you to take on record attached Text and Report only and ignore those submitted earlier by us.
Furthermore, we hereby declare and confirm that Statutory Auditors of the Company, M/s S R Batliboi & Co LLP, Chartered Accountants, have issued their Reports on the audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of Q4/FY 2020-2021 with unmodified opinion.
